name: Panadeals
overview:
Panadeals offers the chance to get rid of the coupons purchased and never used through a very intuitive online interface.

Panadeals offers a better solution for daily deals to be resold and redeemed. The website gives consumers the chance to sell deals they wouldnâ€™t use while providing the opportunity to buy deals they missed the first time. Purchasing on Panadeals is as simple as any e-commerce transaction. The buyer pays and gets instant access to the voucher, while the seller receives the payment after 48 days from the date of purchase. The Panadeals Deal Guarantee protects consumers by offering a full refund if the voucher is found to be invalid within 45 days from the date of purchase. In facts, Panadeals will completely reimburse all the purchasers claiming the invalidity of the voucher within 45 days from the day of purchase.

The site is very easy to use and it only takes minutes to post your deal. The user can set the desired price and still be able to change or remove it at any time. If youâ€™re looking for a specific deal you missed out on, you can always check Panadeals or just browse their extensive list of deals up for resale. Posting a deal is free and you are only charged Â£0.99 plus eight percent of the selling price once your deal is sold.
